Class Order

  • java.lang.Object
    • Order
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Order>

    public class Order
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Order>
    Stores information about an order of shares.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private long agentID
      ID of the agent that initiated the order.
      private boolean buyOrder
      Is true if this is an order to buy shares.
      private int currentQuant
      The current amount of shares this order is for.
      private long id
      ID number of the order.
      private int originalQuant
      The original amount of shares this order is for.
      private double price
      The price of the order.

    • Field Detail

      • price

        private double price
        The price of the order. Can only be in increments of 0.25.

      • originalQuant

        private int originalQuant
        The original amount of shares this order is for.

      • currentQuant

        private int currentQuant
        The current amount of shares this order is for.

      • id

        private long id
        ID number of the order.

      • buyOrder

        private boolean buyOrder
        Is true if this is an order to buy shares. False otherwise.

      • agentID

        private long agentID
        ID of the agent that initiated the order.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Order

        public Order(long agentID,
     double price,
     int originalQuant,
     boolean buyOrder)
        Creates an order based on the parameters specified. The ID of the order is a timestamp.
        Parameters:
        agentID - ID of the agent that initiated the order.
        price - Price that for the shares to buy or sell for this order.
        originalQuant - The quantity of shares the agent originally wants to buy or sell.
        buyOrder - Is true if the agent wants to initiate an order to buy shares. False otherwise.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public long getId()
        Returns:
        The ID of the order.

      • getPrice

        public double getPrice()
        Returns:
        The price of the order.

      • getOriginalQuant

        public int getOriginalQuant()
        Returns:
        The original quantity of shares that the order was for.

      • getCurrentQuant

        public int getCurrentQuant()
        Returns:
        The current quantity of shares that the order is for.

      • setQuant

        public void setQuant(int newQuant)
        Parameters:
        newQuant - The new quantity of shares that the order should be for.

      • setPrice

        public void setPrice(double newPrice)
        Parameters:
        newPrice - The new price to buy/sell that for the order.

      • isBuyOrder

        public boolean isBuyOrder()
        Returns:
        True if the order is an order to buy shares. False otherwise.

      • getCreatorID

        public long getCreatorID()
        Returns:
        The ID of the agent that initiated the order

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Order o)
        Compares the order based on and time of creation. An order is "less than" if either it has a higher price or it was created first.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Order>
